form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Lee introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to eliminate the use of official time by Federal employees.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Union Time on the Taxpayer's Dime Act.

subsection.text: Section 7131 of title 5, United States Code, is amended to read as follows:

section.text: Any activities performed by an employee relating to the business of a labor organization shall be performed during the time the employee is in a non-duty status.
